If you are already registered, this will take you to the game.

text.anonymous_mode_description:
Enter your main bitcoin wallet address to start playing anonymously right away.
Your winnings will be sent to this wallet, or register above to receive up to 9.88% VIP cashbacks.
text.socket_browser:
Your session has expired...please refresh the page.

You can only log into Betcoin in one browser or browser tab at once. This tab/browser could be disconnected due to another window being opened. Please make sure you use only one browser or window at a time to gain access.

Make sure you are using one of the supported browsers below

Chrome / Firefox
text.server_unreachable:
Your connection to the server was interrupted. Please refresh the page.

If the problem persists, please contact our support team.
text.browser_no_supported: We don't support Internet Explorer <= 9, stock android or opera browsers at the moment, please try using the other browsers, such as Chrome, Firefox
text.create wallet instead: If you don't have a bitcoin wallet that can be used to sign messages, create one by using this button:
text.register_header: Log In or Register to Play
text.register_alias: Enter your existing or desired username or your main wallet address
text.congratulations_p2: To deposit funds into your account, please send BTC to the address below
text.verify_title: Verify your wallet address to activate your account
text.edit_verify_title: Verify your wallet address to make changes
text.verify_header: Wallet verification increases the security of your account and bankroll. To verify your wallet, we ask that you send a signed message from your wallet to us. All sensitive account operations will require a signed message from your main wallet address.
text.verify_info_a: As a security measure, you need to sign a message from you main bitcoin account to modify any account information. Signing a message is easy and ensures that the person requesting the changes is indeed the person who has opened the account. You can find detailed instructions in the help section.
text.verify_info_b: The security of your funds is guaranteed using trustless cryptographic algorithms shielding your account from fraud, theft, hacking, and other forms of unauthorized access. Only the person in control of the main bitcoin wallet registered with our system will be able to access the account. It is therefore extremely important that you back up your wallet and keep it secure. If you maintain your BTC wallet secure, your Betcoin account will remain secure, we guarantee it.
text.verify_info_c: With our system, even if your account password or your email account are compromised, the funds on your BetCoin™ account will be safe as the perpetrators will not be able to cash them out to another wallet than the one you have registered with.
text.password_reset_header: To recovery your password we ask that you send a signed message from you wallet to us. Sensitive account operations will after that always necessitate that a signed message from the same wallet is sent
text.verify_wallet_list: The following links contain instructions for signing a message with your bitcoin wallet:
text.verify_wallet_info: Follow these steps to sign a bitcoin message:
text.verify_p1: In your wallet, find the 'Sign Message' option. This is usually found in the 'Receive' area (click the menu button next to your address) or in the 'Tools' menu (select 'Sign Message')
text.verify_p5: The signature text will appear in the 'Signature' field. Wait for the success message
text.verify_p6: Enter the signature text in the field below and submit the form
text.fund_account: To fund your account simply send some BTC to your PERSONAL DEPOSIT ADDRESS:
text.we_recommend:
We recommend that you create a new wallet as this is the fastest way to start playing.
You can do so by clicking the button below which will prompt you a form to securely create a wallet at XXX, a reputable and trusted wallet provider
text.alternative_register: Alternatively you can register and verify an existing wallet
text.message_sign: When signing your message, use the following as the 'content' of the message:
text.forgot_signed_message: Paste the signed message for your MAIN or BACKUP BTC address
text.signed_message: Paste the signed message for your MAIN BitCoin address
text.signed_message_old_address: Paste the signed message for your PREVIOUS MAIN BTC address
text.signed_message_old_backup: Paste the signed message for your PREVIOUS BACKUP BTC address
text.backup_signed_message: Paste the signed message for your BACKUP address
text.contact_p: Your message has been sent, thank you for contacting us! Our Customer Service team will reply to your inquiry as soon as possible
text.title: Title:
text.subject: Subject:
text.to_confirm: To confirm your information, please sign the message below using your main BTC wallet address and paste it in the field below
text.username_min_length: Username must be at least 1 characters long
text.username_max_length: Username must be at maximum 32 characters long
text.invalid_password: Password can contain only alphanumeric characters, A-Z, a-z, or 0-9
text.send_confirmation: Your message has been sent, thank you for contacting us! Our Customer Service team will reply to your inquiry as soon as possible
text.withdraw_amount_exceed_balance: Withdrawal amount should be smaller or equal to balance amount
text.invalid_withdraw_address: Invalid bitcoin wallet address, or the address is same as your deposit address
text.notfound_withdraw_address: The bitcoin wallet address is not found in our system
text.your_wallet_address_password_reset: Enter Your Main or Backup Wallet Address
text.anonymous_upgrade:
To access your account details, please upgrade your anonymous account by entering the required fields below and signing a message with your bitcoin wallet address.
BetCoin VIP Club is a fundamental element of our brand and vision. BetCoin VIP Club membership brings exciting rights and privileges on all BetCoin properties, making the players' user experience easier and more enjoyable.
text.deposit_address_explain: Send Bitcoin to this address to add BTC to your balance
text.new_ticket_help: We are happy to assist you. Please report any incident, problem, or issue you have encountered using the form below, or email us: support@betcoin.tm
text.new_ticket_note: * Note: Please make sure to include your bitcoin wallet address, transaction IDs or other information that we might be able to use to solve your problem
text.ticket_description_placeholder: Type your ticket issue here.  Please indicate bitcoin wallet address or transaction Ids
text.totp_secret_in_used: The Google 2-factor authenticator has been setup
text.totp_verify: Please scan the QR code using google authenticator on mobile devices, and verify the generated one time password in order to activate the Google 2-factor Authentication
text.wallet_backup_info: Your backup wallet address can be used to manually recover your account. If you lose access to your main wallet, you can contact us and we’ll help you use your backup wallet address to verify ownership of your account.
text.first_deposit_text: Congratulations on receiving your (301/350)% first deposit bonus! Please refer to “Bonus Information” for bonus details.

game.client_seed_info: The client seed allows you to directly affect the outcome of each bet by inserting the text you enter into the hash function which generates the outcome of each game.
game.initial_hash_explain: Initial Hash is generated by the combination of the server seed and the initial array.
game.final_array_explain: Final Array is generated by the combination of the client seed and the initial array, and the elements of the array dictate the game results.
